top_comments.comment: Gigi , you have made a new standard for this song! Connecting the peace and the pain. Powerful and timeless.
Galing mo Gigi sana maging international star ka.Yong smiles moy stress reliever.

PLSS SING DEFYING GRAVITY 
THAT IS THE FIRST SONG THAT I'VE HEARD YOU SING IN TV
IYAN DIN KUNG BAKIT TILL NOW NAKA SUBAYBAY PA DIN AKO SAYO HERE IN YOUTUBE
What a beautiful voice but  a bad accompaniment and ugly arrangement of instruments that destroyed the beautiful song...a combination of a beautiful voice but with a very poor instruments..
Whewww.. ito yong pang-hallowen, nakaka panindig-balahibo, nakakakilabot at halimaw sa husay👏👏👏

comments_since_last_sample.body: Someday magka concert to sila sa aranita or sa arena..God knows 🙏🙏🙏🙏bless you all
Unstoppable Gigi, she is the newly famous Filipino singer.
